def_cn: (通常为表示愤怒或厌烦而从会议、演出等)退席，退场
def_en: If you walk out of a meeting, a performance, or an unpleasant situation, you leave it suddenly, usually in order to show that you are angry or bored.

def_cn: 突然离开，抛弃(家庭或伴侣);出走
def_en: If someone walks out on their family or their partner, they leave them suddenly and go to live somewhere else.
If workers walk out, they stop doing their work for a period of time, usually in order to try to get better pay or conditions for themselves.
